function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Systemic gap in the health sector: shortage of manpower, equipment, drugs, and testing capacity","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of updating information on signs over time during the pandemic.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overcrowding in indoor spaces","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or outdated information from osha, cdc, and agc guidelines may lead to ineffective safety practices.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 impacting the construction industry","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of sars-cov-2 on surfaces","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pvp2: virus propagation","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Interrupted or delayed access to healthcare","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to find and treat the abundance of potential breeding sites for immature mosquito stages.","category":"Poor vector-borne diseases control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of the seir model with a known incubation period","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High attack rates at various time points","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to estimate the independent effects of specific npis due to overlapping timing","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and sanitation in shared pet-friendly spaces may contribute to the transmission of diseases among pet owners and their animals.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of specific diagnostic techniques for early detection of sars-cov-2 virus","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The increased reliance on online schooling and work-at-home programs may result in prolonged close contact among individuals, leading to a higher risk of disease transmission in these settings.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contacts between work colleagues or other staff","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic and its impact on public health","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in disease prevalence","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate surveillance and slow response to the arrival of the index case in nigeria","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to specific recommendations and official sources on the internet and media","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social science integration in disease control policies and programs","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on administrative control and personal protection for risk control","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent non-pharmaceutical interventions","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Persistence of sars-cov-2 on
